text: Jeffrey Linton Osborne (born March 9, 1948) is an American singer-songwriter, musician and lyricist. He is the former drummer and lead singer of the American R&B;/soul group L.T.D., with whom he began his musical career in 1970. ==See also== *Carly Simon *Carole King *Olivia Newton-John *Melissa Manchester *Stevie Nicks *Sheena Easton *Billy Joel *Bruce Springsteen *James Taylor *Eddie Murphy *Lou Rawls *Mary Wells *Camille Yarborough *Glenn Yarborough Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American singer-songrwiters Category:American musicians Category:People from Providence, Rhode Island
title: Jeffrey Osborne
